job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltpgtJob DescriptionampnbspOur work depends on a Site Reliability Engineer SRE joining our team to support the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services CMS activities in Columbia MD As an SRE supporting CMS the candidate will be trusted to work on the development analysis and use of monitoring tools and data visualization from multiple sources to proactively ensure the daytoday Enterprise Portal infrastructure health in the Amazon Web Services AWS cloud environment and on physical data centersltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtJob ResponsibilitiesltpgtltulgtltligtSupporting Portal 247 operations and providing oncall support as neededltligtltligtTroubleshooting anomalies as part of Portal system reliabilityltligtltligtIntegrating new data sources to enhance the Portal infrastructure monitoring toolltligtltligtSupporting the development of new visual aids and enhancing existing visual aids to improve early detection of infrastructure anomaliesltligtltligtImproving the performance of existing and new monitoring toolsltligtltligtSupporting the troubleshooting activities to identify the root cause of infrastructure anomalies in a timely mannerltligtltligtEnsuring the systems high availabilityltligtltligtMaintaining required Service Level Agreements SLAltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtJob RequirementsltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree in computer science information systems related field or equivalent experienceltligtltligt4 years of experience supporting a 24x7 Internetoriented production environment preferably across multiple data centers involving at least hundreds of serversltligtltligtProficiency in scripting with Python Perl or shellltligtltligtThorough understanding of fundamental internet protocols such as DNS HTTP and TCPltligtltligtProven experience in various websiteinfrastructure monitoring tools such as Chartbeat ExtraHop NewRelic Dynatrace and SplunkltligtltligtFamiliarity with common opensource infrastructure toolsltligtltligtExperience with common networking equipment Cisco Juniper F5 etcltligtltligtStrong understanding of networking protocolsltligtltligtExperience in fast paced Agile environments using ScrumKanbanltligtltligtExperience in DevOps and Continuous IntegrationContinuous Development CICDltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtPreferred QualificationsltpgtltulgtltligtAWS experience using AWS FedRampltligtltligtAWS System Administration certificationsltligtltligtSAFe certificationsltligtltligtCMS or Health Care Industry experienceltligtltligtExperience utilizing ScrumKanban methodologiesltligtltligtExperience using JIRAltligtltligtProven oral and written skills to communicate with external and internal stakeholders effectivelyltligtltulgt
